programme.title: The Final Countdown
programme.desc: A time warp takes the aircraft carrier USS Nimitz and its captain (Kirk Douglas) back to Pearl Harbor, Dec. 6, 1941.

programme.title: The Legend of the Stardust Brothers
programme.desc: A new wave duo become stars.

programme.title: The Legend of the Stardust Brothers
programme.desc: A new wave duo become stars.

programme.title: Dollars for a Fast Gun
programme.desc: The efforts of a crooked rancher to monopolize water rights are stymied by a young widow and a hired killer.

programme.title: Man, Pride and Vengeance
programme.desc: Don Jose (Franco Nero), a Spanish soldier, meets the beautiful Carmen (Tina Aumont) and instantly becomes obsessed with her.

programme.title: The Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: An old master's grandson learns the style called emotional kung fu.

programme.title: Fearless Hyena II
programme.desc: A member (Jackie Chan) of the Yin-Yang clan fights a Ching dynasty gang known as Heaven and Earth.

programme.title: Knightriders
programme.desc: George Romero's unusual story of a modern-day Renaissance troupe whose participants follow a medieval code of honor.

programme.title: Death Riders
programme.desc: A gang leader named Reaper brings his bikers on a treasure hunt through the desert while an undercover cop follows in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Shaolin Wooden Men
programme.desc: A fighter vows not to speak until he finds the masked man who killed his father.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: A monk's son (Yue Wong) combines the Tiger and Crane fighting styles to defeat an evil priest (Lieh Lo) and avenge his father.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: The warden of a 2022 prison sends an ex-Marine (Ray Liotta) to a jungle island where inmates are left to die.
